station.name: South San Francisco
station.platform_info: Always check destination signs and listen for departure announcements.

intro.#cdata-section: Emerging from a portion of old Rancho Buri Buri, South San Francisco occupies the basin and portions of the sides of a broad valley formed by the San Bruno Mountains on the north and the Coast Range on the west.
